languages.text: "Старший — и по званию, и по опыту — техножрец корабля мертв. Не найдя замену, мы не сможем устранить неизвестные неполадки в варп-двигателе"{n}, — Мастер вокса отвечает моментально, даже не задумываясь — видно, ей не в первой служить "переводчиком" между разными жителями корабля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Старший — и по званию, и по опыту — техножрец корабля мертв. Не найдя замену, мы не сможем устранить неизвестные неполадки в варп-двигателе", {n}— Мастер вокса отвечает моментально, даже не задумываясь — видно, ей не в первой служить "переводчиком" между разными жителями корабля.{/n}

languages.text: "The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Старший — и по званию, и по опыту — техножрец корабля мертв. Не найдя замену, мы не сможем устранить неизвестные неполадки в варп-двигателе"{n}, — Мастер вокса отвечает моментально, даже не задумываясь — видно, ей не в первой служить "переводчиком" между разными жителями корабля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

"The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

"The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

"The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

languages.text: “这艘飞船级别最高、经验最深的技术神甫已经死了。如果找不到人来替代他，我们就没法解决亚空间引擎的问题。”{n}音阵大师甚至没有思考，就脱口而出回答了你的问题。很显然，这已经不是她第一次为形形色色的船员们充当翻译了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这艘飞船级别最高、经验最深的技术祭司已经死了。如果找不到人来替代他，我们就没法解决亚空间引擎的问题。”{n}音阵大师甚至没有思考，就脱口而出回答了你的问题。很显然，这已经不是她第一次为形形色色的船员们充当翻译了。{/n}

languages.text: 「この船で最も階級的にも経験的にも年長の技術司祭が亡くなりました。後任が見つからなければ、ワープエンジンの問題を解決することはできないでしょう」{n}ヴォクスマスターは、考えることなく即答した。彼女が船内の様々な住人の通訳を務めるのは、今回が初めてではないのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この船で最も階級的にも経験的にも年長の技術司祭が亡くなりました。後任が見つからなければ、ワープエンジンの問題を解決することはできないでしょう」{n}ヴォクスマスターは、考えることなく即答した。彼女が船内の様々な住人の通訳を務めるのは、今回が初めてではないのだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Der höchste Techpriester des Schiffs – sowohl im Rang als auch was die Erfahrung angeht – ist tot. Wenn wir keinen Ersatz finden, können wir die Probleme mit dem Warp-Triebwerk nicht beheben", {n}antwortet die Voxmeisterin sofort, ohne auch nur nachzudenken – sie fungiert nicht zum ersten Mal als Dolmetscherin zwischen den Bewohnern des Schiffs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der höchste Techpriester des Schiffs – sowohl im Rang als auch was die Erfahrung angeht – ist tot. Wenn wir keinen Ersatz finden, können wir die Probleme mit dem Warp-Triebwerk nicht beheben", {n}antwortet die Voxmeisterin sofort, ohne auch nur nachzudenken – sie fungiert nicht zum ersten Mal als Dolmetscherin zwischen den Bewohnern des Schiffs.{/n}

languages.text: « Le technoprêtre le plus expérimenté du vaisseau, que ce soit en matière d'ancienneté ou de compétence, est mort. Si nous ne lui trouvons pas de remplaçant, nous ne serons pas en mesure de résoudre les problèmes inhérents au moteur Warp, » {n}répond immédiatement la maîtresse-vox sans même y réfléchir, elle qui est habituée à servir d'interprète entre les différents habitants du vaisseau.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le technoprêtre le plus expérimenté du vaisseau, que ce soit en matière d'ancienneté ou de compétence, est mort. Si nous ne lui trouvons pas de remplaçant, nous ne serons pas en mesure de résoudre les problèmes inhérents au moteur Warp, » {n}répond immédiatement la maîtresse-vox sans même y réfléchir, elle qui est habituée à servir d'interprète entre les différents habitants du vaisseau.{/n}

languages.text: «El tecnosacerdote más veterano de la nave, con el mayor rango y la experiencia más extensa, ha muerto. Si no encontramos un sustituto, no podremos solucionar los problemas del motor de disformidad». {n}La maestra de vocos responde al instante, sin pensar. No es la primera vez que actúa como intérprete entre los habitantes de la nave.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El tecnosacerdote más veterano de la nave, con el mayor rango y la experiencia más extensa, ha muerto. Si no encontramos un sustituto, no podremos solucionar los problemas del motor de disformidad». {n}La maestra de vocos responde al instante, sin pensar. No es la primera vez que actúa como intérprete entre los habitantes de la nave.{/n}

languages.text: "Geminin hem rütbe hem de tecrübe bakımından en kıdemli Tekno Rahibi öldü. Bir yenisini bulamazsak öteboyut motoruyla ilgili sorunları çözemeyeceğiz." {n}Voks Üstadı anında, hiç düşünmeden yanıtlıyor. Belli ki geminin çeşitli sakinleri arasında ilk defa tercümanlık yapmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ship's most senior Tech-Priest — most senior both in rank and in experience — is dead. If we do not find a replacement, we will be unable to resolve the problems with the warp engine," {n}answers the Vox Master instantly, without even thinking — this is not the first time she has acted as an interpreter between the ship's various inhabitants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Geminin hem rütbe hem de tecrübe bakımından en kıdemli Tekno Rahibi öldü. Bir yenisini bulamazsak öteboyut motoruyla ilgili sorunları çözemeyeceğiz," {n}diye yanıtlıyor Voks Üstadı anında, hiç düşünmeden. Belli ki geminin çeşitli sakinleri arasında ilk defa tercümanlık yapmıyor.{/n}
